name: Bakery Simulator (itch)
description:
Have you ever wanted to give people stale bread? This is the game for you!

Welcome to Bakery Simulator! Here's how you play:

Step 1. Customer asks for an item

Step 2. Remember item

Step 3. Go and get item

Step 4. Repeat

Make sure to be kind to your boss- say "yes sir", not just "yes" or "yeah" or "mhm" or "yup". But if you didn't hear him, make sure to ask again.

This is an older game, so it's more likely there will be bugs and glitches. Sorry :(

I'm working on a sequel to this amazing game!

Enjoy, make sure to leave feedback :)
